page.title: 08TRADE IN KING'S STANLEY
page.content:
Here is a list of all the shops in { {King's Stanley:} {Holley's}: groceries and hardware; {Monica's}&{Country Style; hairdressers; {R.Basset:}groceries & vegetables; {Tudor Stores}:groceries,newspapers and chemist; {Daniels:}T.V.& Video shop; {Yew Tree Stores:}newsagents; {Post Office; {Butcher, Fish and Chip shop; {Co-op Supermarket; {Electrical Goods}shop.
Most of the shops are in buildings which have been dwelling houses.Only a few have been built as shops.The greengrocery used to be a club run by the Salvation Army they say.
